thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com
thread.title: Hottrax Inc

author: Hottrax Inc
title: Hottrax Inc
text:
I just love dealing with Godaddy tech support! I know it sounds crazy!
But every time I have an issue they are there to talk me down off of the ledge...I've never had a problem (some created purely by me lol) they couldn't solve or guide me through in more than 7 years.
You'd like to never have to use tech support at all and I really haven't used it that much over the years...and when I do, it's usually because I need step-by-step instruction! But it's nice to know that if there are any issues, things are handled right away and in expert fashion!
Thank you GoDaddy!
